1.content: One day you wake up as a character from Kim Possible. Who is it?
1.title: Beginning

11.content:
It was morning. An alarm was going off. You stretch out your arm to hit the snooze button but are shocked to discover that the alarm clock isn't there.You sit up slowly and open your eyes. The room you are in seems to be like a cartoon. You must have fallen asleep in front of the TV. All you were seeing was what was on at the time.

"Kimmy!" you hear someone say.

Wondering what was on you look around for the TV guide. You are shocked to discover that everything looks like a cartoon. You feel your face, wondering and discover that it feels vaguely normal. So does everything else.

"This is odd!" you say then stop when a girl's voice comes out. You then look around in search of a mirror. Finding one you pick it up and look into it. Kim Possible's face greets you in the mirror.
11.title: Kim Possible

13.content:
You were what you felt a pretty average teen. You looked dashing, but not good at sports. But you were a Kim Possible fan, and your favorite character( and crush) was Shego. Her looks, and her dangerous persallity. Though when you went to bed for the night, you began to fell like your soul was being lifted from you. And then immediately placed down again, but you couldn't get the feeling that something felt off...

When you woke up you found yourself in a pretty strange room, dull, like a cell. You rubbed you face, which felt softer than usual, and had long black hair get in your face. You then realized that it was YOUR hair. You shot upward and found a hand mirror on a nightstand next to you. You quickly looked into it and saw Shego's face!

info.brief_description: You get swapped with a Kim Possible Character
info.description:
One day you wake up as a Kim Possible charater.

You are an average height male 15 year old who is not very good at sports or physical activities.

When you are swapped with the Kim possible Characters you do not gain the ability to do certain things. Only for Shego does this happen (for the glowing hands).Only follow the main charaacter.

Keep it E rated

Keep to good spelling

If making a list of what happens that is longer than 2 keep the end open for more additions.

Have fun.
